item.description: Journaling is not just a little thing you do to pass the time, to write down your memories—though it can be—it’s a strategy that has helped brilliant, powerful and wise people become better at what they do.

item.title: How to use this Hugo theme ?
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: After downloding the theme, uzip the file and go to the ’lightbi-hugo-master’ folder. Open the folder in you editor and run the hugo build command as below. hugo It will create a folder named ‘public’ and in the same you can find the website created by Hugo from the contents from ‘content’ folder and the theme.

item.title: Collections No.1
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: Articles about learn in public, brag document and free stuffs. Learn In Public If there’s a golden rule, it’s this one, so I put it first. All the other rules are more or less elaborations of this rule #1.

item.title: Build a Hugo Blog
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: Hugo? It’s a fast and static website generator written in the Go language. Websites built with Hugo can be hosted anywhere from GitHub Pages to Amazon S3 without any database or other language dependencies.

item.title: What is Markdown ?
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: What is Markdown? The Markdown Guide is a free and open-source reference guide that explains how to use Markdown, the simple and easy-to-use markup language you can use to format virtually any document.

item.title: Basic Syntax
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: Headings To create a heading, add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase. The number of number signs you use should correspond to the heading level. For example, to create a heading level three (h3), use three number signs (e.

item.title: Rich Content
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Host in Netlify
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: You can host your static website wth zero cost in Netlify. Add the below netlify.toml in the root folder. [build] publish = "public" command = "hugo --gc --minify" [context.production.environment] HUGO_VERSION = "0.

item.title: Who am I ?!
item.author: ahmadyusufmaulana0@gmail.com (Ahmad Yusuf Maulana)
item.description: Who am I ?! This is the most asked question in my life. Yet no clear answer has yet been found. As a child, the answer to this question was simple.
